posts.post_content:
Greetings,

I collect t206s and my kids (11 and 12) have, through them, learned to love the older tobacco cards and players. They are each interested in getting a  t201 or t202.

So, I am looking to purchase one or two of these for the holiday. Anyone have any interesting ones for sale? Cards need to be ungraded as the kids like touching them and folding the 201s. Obviously looking for low cost. I see them on ebay but not so much on the forum so figured I'd check. If you have a kid-friendly card looking for a home, please let me know.

Thanks!

Eric
Hi Eric, I have a lower grade T201 , let me know if you are still looking, Sylvain

Pm sent last week.  Did you get it?
Thanks.
Doug

Doug, sorry I did miss your PM. I just sent you an email particularly on the 202s.

Sylvain, I believe my 201 need was satisfied though curious to know what player you have. Thank you for the offer.

And thanks Jim (dnanln) - looking forward to getting the 201s for my boys!

Eric

Eric:
Thats awesome...good for you and your sons.
